title: vmware: display incorrect host_ip for hypervisor show

comments.content:
From VCenter driver,  with compute node configured to be cluster01. And VCenter IP is 10.9.1.43
But with hypervisor show command, it will display the host IP for the controller node. It should be pointing to 
the really VCenter IP.

comments.content: This is because in your nova.conf, my_ip = 10.9.3.83 (you controller).  Please update it to match your vCenter host.  See http://docs.openstack.org/grizzly/openstack-compute/admin/content/vmware.html#VMWareVCDriver_details.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~thang-pham

comments.content: This can make it work. Wondering if this can be configured automatically based on vmware section "host_ip".
